channel.title: Cryptocurrencies Feed
channel.description: This feed is responsible for generating the rss feed related to the topic Cryptocurrencies

item.title: How Much Bitcoin To Own in 2026 — Financial Planners Weigh In
item.description: Financial experts say Bitcoin may suit 2026 portfolios as a high-risk, high-reward asset. Key factors include risk tolerance, age and diversification strategy.
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates

item.title: I Asked ChatGPT To Explain Bitcoin to Me Like I’m 12 — Here’s What It Said
item.description: Even adults who are savvy with financial know-how can struggle to understand how cryptocurrency works. So we decided to put ChatGPT to the test.
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates

item.title: Expert Warns How You Invest in Bitcoin Can Drastically Alter Results — 2 Reasons To Tread Lightly
item.description: Bitcoin investing isn’t one-size-fits-all—an expert reveals 2 key reasons your approach could make or break your returns. Tread carefully.
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates

item.title: How Fidelity Just Made It Easier for the Average American To Invest In Bitcoin
item.description: Fidelity brokerage clients became the largest shareholders in Metaplanet, a Tokyo investment firm. This might make it easier for investors to dip into crypto.
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates

item.title: 10 Things You Must Know About Crypto Taxes Before You File in 2026
item.description: To be sure you're reporting any tax-relevant info correctly and not getting into trouble, two money experts explained what to know about crypto before filing.
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates

item.title: Understanding the Shift in Consumer Behavior
item.description: Nasdaq TradeTalks explores the intersection of emerging crypto legislation and the digital asset market evolution. Chris Dearborn, Managing Director on the Nasdaq Market Intelligence Desk, also analyzes why consumer spending behavior is shifting and what it means for companies.
item.dc:creator: TradeTalks

item.title: 6 of the Best Times To Buy Bitcoin in History — and When To Buy Next
item.description: The best times to buy bitcoin have almost always come during periods of fear, when prices bottomed out after hype-driven bubbles burst. What's coming next?
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates

item.title: 3 Ways To Earn Money With Crypto — Aside From Actually Investing In It
item.description: Want to earn money from cryptocurrency without actually investing in it? Discover how staking, cloud mining and liquidity pools could help you earn money.
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates

item.title: July 2025 Review and Outlook
item.description: July continued the strong run for stocks seeing the S&P 500 up for the third month in a row, and the Nasdaq for the fourth.
item.dc:creator: The Market Intelligence Desk Team

item.title: Companies Are Buying This Crypto — and No, It’s Not Bitcoin: Should You Invest Too?
item.description: Bitcoin isn't the only crypto worth investing in. Another name getting attention lately is ethereum, the No. 2 crypto with a market cap of bout $456 billion.
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates

item.title: Major Bank Thinks Bitcoin Is Going To Get Less Volatile — Is It Time To Invest?
item.description: Bitcoin may be entering a new era. Discover why its volatility could be falling and how that might attract cautious investors and reshape crypto’s future.
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates

item.title: 3 Ways Trump Signing the GENIUS Act Could Impact the Price of Crypto
item.description: President Donald Trump signed the GENIUS Act into law. It's the first significant legislation for crypto in the U.S. What does it mean for crypto prices?
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates

item.title: One of the Most Promising Frontiers for the Future of Finance
item.description: Nasdaq TradeTalks explores what consumer discretionary categories are performing well and where spend is being cut back. Paul Grewal, Chief Legal Officer at Coinbase, also shares why tokenization is one of the most promising frontiers for the future of finance.
item.dc:creator: TradeTalks

item.title: Here’s What Could Happen to Cryptocurrency if Trump Fires Jerome Powell
item.description: Here's what crypto investors need to know if President Donald Trump fires Fed Chair Jerome Powell.
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates

item.title: I Asked ChatGPT How To Get Rich Off of Bitcoin — Here’s What It Said
item.description: Get rich with bitcoin in 2025 -- ChatGPT suggested ideas like buy-and-hold, day trading, crypto payments and Bitcoin-related stock. Learn this plus the risks.
item.dc:creator: GOBankingRates
